name: Javascript_Tic_Tac_Toe
description: The purpose of this project is to demonstrate Object oriented programming in Javascript by building a Tic Tac Toe. We use Factory Functions instead of Constructors, mainly to avoids [the common problems when using Constructors](http://programmersought.com/article/1489923583/;jsessionid=F19A3E3A71789826419AE74550D104A2). We use Module Pattern to demonstrate the benefit of using private and public functions (closure). We create a user interface to play the game.
